description: One of the captain ball of FC Oedo Neo who participated his last game (his retirement game) with http://anidb.net/ch10409 [Yorozuya], http://anidb.net/ch1655 [Hasegawa Taizou], http://anidb.net/ch1169 [Shimura Tae], http://anidb.net/ch1650 [Sarutobi Ayame], http://anidb.net/ch1165 [Zura], http://anidb.net/ch1166 [Elizabeth] and http://anidb.net/ch1657 [Kondou Isao] against FC Oedo Ambivalence who were guided by the Matsuno brothers.
name: Amarao Daisaku
